√bṛh1 'make big or strong'

present: [1.] bṛṅhati  bṛṅhate etc.   -- [6.] bṛhati etc.  

perfect: babarha  babṛhāṇá  

verbal: bṛḍha  vṛḍha  

secondary: intensive: bárbṛhat  barbṛhi   -- causative: barhaya  bṛṅhayati etc.  vṛṅh- E.+  vṛṅh-  

derivatives: bṛh- V.+  barha S.+  -bárhaṇa V.+  barháṇā RV.  bṛhánt V.+  -bárhas V.B.  bárhiṣṭha V.+  barhís? V.+  bráhman V.+  brahmán V.+  -bṛṅhin C.  bṛṅhaṇa E.+  bṛṅhaṇīya C.  bṛṅhayitavya C.  

Compare the following root.
